snippet: Shutdowns make strange bedfellows. Case in point: A letter released Friday from the Chamber of Commerce, the A.F.L.-C.I.O. and the United Way urging Congress to reach a budget deal.
abstract: Shutdowns make strange bedfellows. Case in point: A letter released Friday from the Chamber of Commerce, the A.F.L.-C.I.O. and the United Way urging Congress to reach a budget deal.

headline.main: An Unusual Coalition Presses for End to Shutdown
